content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electric Pole at position (2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position (2.5, 2.5)) - currently not plugged into the electric network.

### Electric Pole at position (1.5, 1.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position (1.5, 1.5)) - connected to the lab at position (6.5, 6.5).

### Electric Pole at position (9.5, 6.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position (9.5, 6.5)) - connected to the lab at position (6.5, 6.5).

### Electric Pole at position (9.5, 8.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position (9.5, 8.5)) - connected to the lab at position (6.5, 6.5).

### Lab at position (6.5, 6.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position (6.5, 6.5)) - currently not powered.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to electric poles not being plugged in
- Ensure that electric poles are connected to the electric network by placing them in appropriate locations and connecting them to other power sources.

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Check your inventory to ensure you have enough small electric poles before attempting to place them. If you run out, gather more resources to craft additional poles.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Verify that the entities you are trying to connect (e.g., electric poles and labs) are within the connection range. If they are too far apart, the connection will fail.

### Errors when trying to place entities in occupied spaces
- Make sure to check that the target position for placing an entity is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place it.
